definition: an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: Two people are at a French château.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位路人在一座法國古堡中就餐。

sentences.english: Stop and visit the medieval castle.
sentences.chinese: 停下來遊覽這個中世紀的古堡。

sentences.english: The north wing of the castle was destroyed in a fire.
sentences.chinese: 古堡的北翼毀於一場大火。

sentences.english: It was a chateau; it is no longer anything but a farm.
sentences.chinese: 它原是一個古堡，現在只是一個農家的莊屋了。

sentences.english: This is the famed ancient Xiangxi Castle.
sentences.chinese: 這就是香溪堡非常有名的古堡。

sentences.english: They visited some ancient chateaux while they stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 在法國逗留期間他們參觀了一些古堡。

sentences.english: Churches and castles are almost all that remain of the original city.
sentences.chinese: 教堂與古堡大概是古城遺留下來的惟一的東西。

sentences.english: The castle lower steps with slabs, up to 800 meters.
sentences.chinese: 古堡下層臺階用石板鋪成，長達800米。

sentences.english: The placid lake reflected the image of the old castle.
sentences.chinese: 平靜的湖面倒映着古堡的影像。

sentences.english: This well known property has always been considered one of the best Grand Cru of St-Emilion.
sentences.chinese: 此著名的古堡被譽爲聖埃米利永產區最好的特級酒莊。

sentences.english: This is the old castle of Arco .
sentences.chinese: 這是阿科小鎮上的古堡。

sentences.english: Rumors have it that secret tunnels lead out of this castle, but we haven't found any.
sentences.chinese: 傳說這座古堡裏面有條暗道，可我們還沒找到。

sentences.english: Water Bougets - Conferred on those who had brought water to an army or besieged place.
sentences.chinese: 專用授予那一些曾經給受困的軍隊和古堡運送水的人。

sentences.english: Since then, Ch Mouton did not have a second label for the next 70 so years.
sentences.chinese: 在後來得70多年裏，木桐古堡一直沒有真正的副牌。

sentences.english: Wing of the castle was destroyed in a fire.
sentences.chinese: 古堡的北翼毀於一場大火。

sentences.english: It has one of the largest forts in Oman, and a big, new souq.
sentences.chinese: 尼茲瓦有阿曼最大的古堡和一個新的大露天市場。
